00030                                                                     {
00031     cmat *otf=cnew(psf->nx, psf->ny);
00032     cmat *otfsave=cnew(psf->nx, psf->ny);
00033     cfft2plan(otf, 1);
00034     cfft2plan(otf, -1);
00035     cfft2plan(otfsave,1);
00036     ccpd(&otf, psf);//loaded psf has peak in corner
00037     cifft2(otf, 1);//turn to OTF, peak in corner
00038     ccwm(otf, dtf->nominal);
00039     ccp(&otfsave, otf);
00040     cfft2(otf, -1);//turn back.
00041     spmulcreal(i0->p, dtf->si, otf->p, 1);
00042     ccp(&otf, otfsave);
00043     PCMAT(otf, potf);
00044     PCMAT(otfsave, potfsave);
00045     //Now derivative
00046     for(int iy=0; iy<otf->ny; iy++){
00047     for(int ix=0; ix<otf->nx; ix++){
00048         potf[iy][ix]*=dtf->U->p[ix];
00049         potfsave[iy][ix]*=dtf->U->p[iy];
00050     }
00051     }
00052     cfft2(otf, 1);
00053     cfft2(otfsave, 1);
00054     spmulcreal(gx->p,dtf->si,otf->p,1);
00055     spmulcreal(gy->p,dtf->si,otfsave->p,1);
00056     cfree(otf); cfree(otfsave);
00057 }

00063     int nx=i0->nx;
00064     double (*i0p)[nx]=(void*)i0->p;
00065     double (*i0x1p)[nx]=(void*)i0x1;
00066     double (*i0x2p)[nx]=(void*)i0x2;

void mtch ( dcell **  mtche,
dmat **  sanea,
dcell *  i0,
dcell *  gx,
dcell *  gy,
double  pixtheta,
double  rne,
double  bkgrnd,
int  cr 
)

Compute matched filter. 

00094                                         {
00095     double kp=1./pixtheta;
00096     const double psfvar=0;
00097     int nmod=3;
00098     if(cr){
00099     nmod=7;
00100     }
00101     const long nsa=i0->nx;
00102     const long nx=i0->p[0]->nx;
00103     const long ny=i0->p[0]->ny;
00104     const long npixtot=nx*ny;
00105     dmat *i0m=dnew(2,nmod);
00106     dmat *i0g=dnew(npixtot, nmod);
00107     PDMAT(i0m,pi0m);
00108     PDMAT(i0g,pi0g);
00109     dmat *wt=dnew(npixtot, 1);
00110     
00111     *mtche=dcellnew(nsa,1);
00112     *sanea=dnew(nsa*2,1);
00113     
00114     pi0m[0][0]=1;
00115     pi0m[1][1]=1;
00116 
00117     if(cr){
00118     pi0m[3][0]=1;
00119     pi0m[4][0]=-1;
00120     pi0m[5][1]=1;
00121     pi0m[6][1]=-1;
00122     }
00123     for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){    
00124 
00125     dzero(i0g);
00126     //kp is here to ensure good conditioning
00127     adddbl(pi0g[0], 1, gx->p[isa]->p, npixtot, 1);
00128     adddbl(pi0g[1], 1, gy->p[isa]->p, npixtot, 1);
00129     adddbl(pi0g[2], 1, i0->p[isa]->p, npixtot, kp);
00130     if(cr){
00131         mki0shx(pi0g[3], pi0g[4], i0->p[isa], kp);
00132         mki0shy(pi0g[5], pi0g[6], i0->p[isa], kp);
00133     }
00134     for(long ipix=0; ipix<npixtot; ipix++){
00135         wt->p[ipix]=1./(rne*rne+bkgrnd+i0->p[isa]->p[ipix]+psfvar*i0->p[isa]->p[ipix]);
00136     }
00137     
00138     dmat *tmp=dpinv(i0g, wt,NULL);
00139     dmm(&(*mtche)->p[isa],i0m,tmp,"nn",1);
00140     dfree(tmp);
00141     dcwpow(wt,-1);
00142     dmat *nea2=dtmcc((*mtche)->p[isa], wt);
00143     //Drop coupling in x/y gradients.
00144     (*sanea)->p[isa]=sqrt(nea2->p[0]);
00145     (*sanea)->p[isa+nsa]=sqrt(nea2->p[3]);
00146     dfree(nea2);
00147     }
00148   
00149     dfree(wt);
00150     dfree(i0g);
00151     dfree(i0m);
00152 }
